attributes.action: Increase Statutory Maternity Pay (SMP) and Maternity Allowance (MA)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to try to raise current Statutory Maternity Pay (SMP) and Maternity Allowance (MA) to a more suitable amount. It currently stands at £117.18 p/week or 90% of average weekly earning whichever is LESS. For example, it is currently better for a registered nurse to go on long term sick pay than maternity leave.
